Disposizioni e deleghe al Governo in materia di intelligenza artificiale

The document outlines the regulations and delegations made by the government regarding artificial intelligence. It covers various aspects such as definitions, principles, and applications of AI in different areas. The document is intended for internal documentation purposes only and does not grant any permission for unauthorized use or reproduction.

Key Concepts:

  • A legislative decree on artificial intelligence
  • Internal documentation needs of parliamentary bodies
  • Responsibility for unauthorized use of documents
  • Principles for information and data privacy
  • Utilizzo Responsabile dell'IA
  • Tutele dei Diritti Fondamentali
  • Collaborazioni Pubblico-Private
  • Formazione e Ricerca
